document_data.name: Cone of Euphoria
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cone of euphoria''''' was a spell that affected the mind.
document_data.Effects: When cast, a cone of sparkling motes was exhaled by the caster. This cone extended up to {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} from the caster and had an area of up to {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}}. Any creature within this cone was struck by an intense sensation of euphoria.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], a small amount of [[gem]] dust with a value of at least 10 [[gold piece]]s.
